name: The Directory Game
description:
UPDATE 2022-4-9: I completely forgot about this game and when I remembered about it today I found out the included download file is broken. I will try to fix the game in my spare time, so please be patient.

This is a puzzle game about navigating directories which contain files with hidden password in them. You need to use these password in order to extract encrypted archives. Password cracking is considered cheating!

To complete the game you'll need a PNG viewer(e.g. Gwenview, Windows Photo Viewer) and an Ogg player (e.g. VLC).
